cast.title: Blonde Comet
cast.overview: A tire manufacturer's daughter becomes a champion auto racer.

cast.title: The First Auto
cast.overview: The transition from horses to automobiles at the turn of the century causes problems between a father and son.

cast.title: The Speed Kings
cast.overview: Race-car drivers pursue Mabel Normand, whose father has a clear favorite.

cast.original_title: Barney Oldfield's Race for a Life
cast.title: Barney Oldfield's Race for a Life
cast.overview: When Mabel Normand romantically rejects a villain, he ties her to the railroad tracks, leaving her nice suitor to appeal to racecar driver Barney Oldfield for help.

cast.title: Gadgets Galore
cast.overview: This Warner Bros. short reviews in an often humorous way the impact of the automobile on the United States. By 1900, the horseless carriage was beginning to have an impact. Early adopters were often the object of attention by large curious crowds. There were many car manufacturers and the quality of their product varied considerably. Traffic jams, pollution and automobile racing were only a few of the outcomes.

cast.title: Marlene Dietrich: Her Own Song
cast.overview: The films, affairs and struggles of the iconic star of The Blue Angel as told by Rosemary Clooney, Roger Corman, Deanna Durbin and many more.

crew.overview: Two troubled adolescents chronicle the events that ultimately lead up to a terrifying assault on their school.
crew.title: Zero Day
